messages.title: Gedling Election update
messages.content: Despite the Prime Minister telling the British public time and time again that she wouldn't, we now face a General Election. It's clear we cannot trust a word she says.

issues.brexitEurope: hard Brexit the Tories intend on pursuing
issues.socialWelfare: letting down local working class families and those who need a helping hand

leaflet.personalStatement: I have been privileged to serve the people of Gedling for 20 years now and I am standing again as your Labour candidate in the election on 8th June.

images.caption: Vernon Coaker standing beside a 'GEDLING COLLIERY' sign.

leaflet.additionalNotes: I NEED YOUR HELP. Please get in touch if you can help deliver leaflets. Would like a poster or garden stake.
